tables.description: Contains customer details and signup activity.

schema.name: customer_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for the customer.

schema.name: first_name
schema.description: Customer's first name.

schema.name: last_name
schema.description: Customer's last name.

schema.name: email
schema.description: Customer's email address.

schema.name: signup_date
schema.description: Date the customer signed up.

schema.name: member_since
schema.description: Timestamp when the customer record was created in the system, often different from signup date.

schema.name: last_login_date
schema.description: Date of the customer's last login.

tables.description: Contains details of products available in the catalog.

schema.name: product_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for the product.

schema.name: product_name
schema.description: Name of the product.

schema.name: prod_cat_id
schema.description: Foreign key to the product_category table.

schema.name: price_usd
schema.description: Price of the product in USD.

schema.name: created_at_ts
schema.description: Timestamp when the product was added to the catalog.

schema.name: catalog_effective_date
schema.description: Date the product became visible in the online catalog.

schema.name: last_updated_at_ts
schema.description: Timestamp when the product details were last updated.

schema.name: is_available
schema.description: Availability status of the product.

tables.description: Defines product categories and their names.

schema.name: category_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for the product category.

schema.name: category_name
schema.description: Name of the product category.

tables.description: Captures customer orders and payment details.

schema.name: order_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for the order.

schema.name: cust_acct_id
schema.description: Foreign key to the customer table, but with a non-standard name.

schema.name: order_total_usd
schema.description: Total price of the order.

schema.name: shipping_date
schema.description: The date the order was shipped. Should be after order_date.

schema.name: delivery_date
schema.description: The date the order was delivered. Should be after shipping_date.

schema.name: payment_method
schema.description: Payment method used for the order.

tables.description: Details of individual items within an order.

schema.name: order_item_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for the order item.

schema.name: order_num
schema.description: Foreign key to the orders table, but with a non-standard name.

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: Foreign key to the products table, but with a non-standard name.

schema.name: quantity
schema.description: Number of units of the product in this order item.

schema.name: line_item_total
schema.description: Price of the single line item (quantity * price).
